segments.text: I'm focused on the two children in the center of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is quite ambitious, climbing onto a small two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His target is clear: the open “COOKIE JAR” in the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, one hand already inside the jar, pulling out a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he's holding a plate, perhaps to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool, oh, it looks incredibly unstable beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed, tilting backward precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I keep thinking it's going to topple over with him on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, with her arm outstretched towards him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's waiting patiently, her palm open, ready for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've clearly orchestrated this little cookie raid together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an impressive display of teamwork, despite the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the stool finally gives way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their determination is quite something to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
